Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory514.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanoid', 3: 'Have you finished?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'We apologize... We viewed many irrelevant memories, and that feels inappropriate, even with your consent.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mechanoid', 3: "It doesn't matter as long as you don't affect my operation.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Since Nanami and Arcana wanted to understand what this mechanoid was thinking, he allowed them to access his memory storage unit.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's why you came back... and restored the online server.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mechanoid', 3: 'But a new high score was gained by a player named "NANAMI", which stopped me from achieving first place with my old strategies.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Well, Nanami is pretty amazing!', 4: '2'}
{3: "Another round has ended, but the mechanoid's score is still a bit away from Nanami's highest score, placing him below her ranking."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Impressive... but there's only one more round left. You won't get first place if you can't beat Nanami here!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mechanoid', 3: 'Nanami... "NANAMI"... You\'re the Sagemachina those mechanoids were searching for, aren\'t you...?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Arcana', 3: "Indeed. She is the Sage we've been seeking... You were awakened because of her guidance.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanoid', 3: "As expected... I don't know why, but I can feel that you are different from other mechanoids.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Are you still going to challenge Nanami now that you know I'm Sagemachina?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mechanoid', 3: "My calculation tells me that there's no way I can beat you, whether with my computing power as a mechanoid or my experience as a player.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The last loading screen flickers as the mechanoid focuses back on the screen.'}
{3: 'A familiar figure appears in his memory shell. Master Oakes probably also realized that he could not complete this challenge with his own body back then.'}
{2: 'Mechanoid', 3: "I can't defeat the Sagemachina on my own, but I can see that there's a new possibility if I combine my strength with a human's wisdom.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The mechanoid recalls the time he spent completing this game and accompanying Master Oakes.'}
{2: 'Mechanoid', 3: 'I will surpass you... for this is the purpose of my existence.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watching the mechanoid quietly, Nanami smiles and nods.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'In that case... Do your best. Nanami will be here to cheer you on.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: "Arcana gently walks to Nanami's sides without being able to take her eyes away from the gaming mechanoid."}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'Can he really surpass your score, Sage...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hmph! Do you also think that he can beat me, now?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: "That's not it... I've run many simulations, and I still can't see a future where he succeeds and his efforts are not in vain.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: "I suppose it's fortunate that his personality data won't be deleted by the command this way.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Is that so...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Right as Nanami is about to speak, they feel a tremble outside the estate.'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: "Sage... I'm afraid we have Corrupted incoming.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Is it because the online server was restarted? I didn't expect the Corrupted to arrive so soon...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Arcana glances at the mechanoid, and he shows no sign of moving. All his attention and computing power has been reserved for the game.'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'Sage... I recommend taking him back to the Church by force. He will end up as a victim of the Punishing Virus and the Corrupted if he stays here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'However, Nanami shakes her head and looks Arcana in the eyes.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'This could be the last challenge of his life... It will be a shame if we have to cut it short.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Nanami grabs Arcana by her hands. This is the first time Arcana experiences Nanami's existence with her own hands."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Let's help him, Arcana.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Arcana can feel that this isn\'t an "order" from her Sage but a "plea" from her friend.'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'Of course, Sage... I understand. Allow me to stand by your side.', 4: '1'}
